channel.title: vr on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in vr on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-29
item.description: Apple offering engineers $180,000 bonuses to prevent poaching (2 minute read) The employee poaching war between Apple and Meta is heating up, with Apple now offering top engineering talents stock bonuses worth up to $180,000 to prevent them from defecting.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-01
item.description: Facebook’s Meta watch has a camera notch, according to first leaked image (2 minute read) Leaked images of Facebook’s smartwatch show a camera notch that is clearly visible when the watch’s screen is off.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-14
item.description: Facebook execs tease VR prototype hardware with new photos (2 minute read) Mark Zuckerberg and Andrew Bosworth recently posted pictures of themselves wearing prototype headsets and linking the concepts to Facebook’s work on the metaverse.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-08
item.description: Minecraft is coming to PlayStation VR as a free upgrade later this month (1 minute read) Minecraft will be playable for free on PlayStation VR later this month.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-25
item.description: Apple reportedly acquires VR startup ‘Spaces’ (1 minute read) Spaces is a startup with a team that specializes in virtual reality technologies.
